short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly manage your tweets with Spread - Your personal AI assistant for social media!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate solution for your social media management - Spread!

With this powerful tool, you can effortlessly schedule your X posts in advance, allowing you to save time and stay organized. Create drafts for your tweets, so you can come back to them later and perfect them before publishing.

Stay on top of the latest trends and news by receiving top tweets every hour on topics that interest you. This feature is perfect for staying up-to-date with industry news or keeping track of your competitors.

Spread also allows you to generate tweets about topics of your interest or tweets that match your preferences. Our advanced AI technology can quickly and easily generate relevant and engaging tweets, making it easier than ever to create content that resonates with your audience.
So why wait? Install the Spread Chrome extension today and start streamlining your social media management!
